subject: Re: [junit] Failure
msgSnippet: Set your classpath: set CLASSPATH=;c: junit3.8.1 junit.jar;c: Source. Source folder contains the test classes. Run your test. If it fails, please mail the
messageBody:
Set your classpath:
set CLASSPATH=;c:\junit3.8.1\junit.jar;c:\Source.
Source folder contains the test classes. Run your
test. If it fails, please mail the code.
Thanks
Balakrishnan
